name: Rule Order
description:
Made by: MS ANNOTATION X

    This is a short platformer game, made for "GMTK Game Jam 2020".

    This was my first game jam where I participated in solo and I made a game within 48 hours. This was so fun and unforgettable experience, the final moments of exporting and publishing the game was so stressful. I learned a lot of new things during this game jam! 

  I hope you will enjoy the game, don't forget to leave some feedback and to tell me about any bug you found in the game. Have fun! 

How to play?

Move left with: A, Q or with the  left arrow key.

Move right with: D, or right arrow key.

Jump with: Space bar.

You can restart the game by clicking "R".

At any time you can exit the game by clicking "Escape".

Upcoming update:

1. SFX will be added to the game.

2. Background will be added.

3. Some fixes to the game.

4. Maybe I will add more levels.
